title: Phase 2.2: Backstage dependency provider
description: Discover dependencies from Backstage catalog via REST API. Parses spec.dependsOn (0.95 confidence) and spec.consumesApis (0.90 confidence). Extracts ownership from spec.owner. Uses existing httpx (no new dependencies). Files: src/nthlayer/dependencies/providers/backstage.py, tests/test_deps_provider_backstage.py. CLI: nthlayer deps --provider backstage, nthlayer blast-radius --provider backstage.
